title: Cecily Strong | DeSantis Bans Mask Mandates, Trump Says COVID Was 'Over' When He Left: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Republicans like Ron DeSantis and Donald Trump lying about masks and trying to rewrite history when it comes to their negligent handling of the coronavirus pandemic.

Then, Cecily Strong talks about moving to upstate New York during the pandemic and her dramatic interactions with nature.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
